remarks: Deduction from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90.  Similar to ~ exlimdh but with one slightly different hypothesis.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 30-Dec-2017.)
statement:
exlimd2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
exlimd2.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> A. x ch ) ) $.
exlimd2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
exlimd2 $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x ps -> ch ) ) $.
